countryHighPoints.name: Carrauntoohil
countryHighPoints.description: Ireland's highest peak, located in County Kerry's MacGillycuddy's Reeks mountain range.

countryHighPoints.name: Ben Nevis
countryHighPoints.description: The highest mountain in Scotland and the United Kingdom, located near Fort William in the Scottish Highlands.

countryHighPoints.name: Pico de Orizaba
countryHighPoints.description: Mexico's highest peak and the third-highest in North America, a dormant stratovolcano on the border of Veracruz and Puebla.

countryHighPoints.name: Hallasan
countryHighPoints.description: South Korea's highest mountain, a shield volcano on Jeju Island with a crater lake at its summit.

countryHighPoints.name: Mulhacén
countryHighPoints.description: Spain's highest peak, located in the Sierra Nevada mountain range in Andalusia.

countryHighPoints.name: Mount Kosciuszko
countryHighPoints.description: Australia's highest mountain, located in Kosciuszko National Park in New South Wales.

countryHighPoints.name: Mount Fuji
countryHighPoints.description: Japan's highest peak and iconic sacred mountain, an active stratovolcano located southwest of Tokyo.

otherMountains.name: Sincholagua
otherMountains.description: A stratovolcano in the Cordillera Real of Ecuador, known for its challenging climbing routes and stunning views of the surrounding Andes.

otherMountains.name: Iztaccíhuatl
otherMountains.description: Mexico's third-highest peak, a dormant stratovolcano whose ridgeline resembles a sleeping woman, located in central Mexico near Puebla.

otherMountains.name: Rucu Pichincha
otherMountains.description: A volcanic peak towering above Quito, accessible via the TelefériQo cable car followed by a steep hike through páramo grasslands.

otherMountains.name: Kristínartindar
otherMountains.description: A dramatic ridge near Skaftafell in Vatnajökull National Park, offering panoramic views of glaciers and black sand plains.

otherMountains.name: Montserrat
otherMountains.description: An iconic serrated mountain near Barcelona, home to the Benedictine monastery of Santa Maria de Montserrat.

otherMountains.name: Medicine Bow Peak
otherMountains.description: The highest point in the Snowy Range of Wyoming's Medicine Bow Mountains, a popular hiking destination in Medicine Bow-Routt National Forest.

otherMountains.name: Mount Cargill
otherMountains.description: A prominent peak overlooking Dunedin on New Zealand's South Island, featuring the Organ Pipes rock formation near its summit.

otherMountains.name: Buttars Peak
otherMountains.description: A peak near Dunedin on New Zealand's South Island, accessible via trails connecting to Mount Cargill.

otherMountains.name: Mount Holmes
otherMountains.description: A summit in the hills above Dunedin, New Zealand, part of the Mount Cargill ridge system.

otherMountains.name: Collina del Vomero
otherMountains.description: A hilltop neighborhood in Naples offering sweeping views of the Bay of Naples, Mount Vesuvius, and the city below.

otherMountains.name: The Acropolis
otherMountains.description: The ancient citadel hill of Athens, crowned by the Parthenon and other classical monuments, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

otherMountains.name: Camaderry Mountain
otherMountains.description: A mountain in the Wicklow Mountains of Ireland, offering views over Glendalough and its monastic settlement.

otherMountains.name: Tunnel Mountain
otherMountains.description: A small peak in the town of Banff, Alberta, offering accessible views of the Canadian Rockies, the Bow Valley, and surrounding peaks.

otherMountains.name: Pic White
otherMountains.description: A peak in the Laurentian Mountains near Mont Tremblant, Quebec, popular for hiking and backcountry skiing.

otherMountains.name: Skinnarviksberget
otherMountains.description: The highest natural point on Södermalm island in Stockholm, a popular viewpoint overlooking the city skyline and Lake Mälaren.

otherMountains.name: Mitake-san
otherMountains.description: A sacred mountain west of Tokyo in the Chichibu-Tama-Kai National Park, home to the ancient Musashi-Mitake Shrine.
